Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.autodownload

Class PlaylistWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.work.ListenableWorker
      • androidx.work.Worker
        • com.penthera.virtuososdk.internal.impl.workmanager.VirtuosoBaseWorker
          • com.penthera.virtuososdk.autodownload.PlaylistWorker
  • public class PlaylistWorker
extends com.penthera.virtuososdk.internal.impl.workmanager.VirtuosoBaseWorker
    The playlist worker runs to process all playlist scheduling. It is triggered to run when an asset has been deleted. Playlist updates are constrained to only run when a network is available and the device battery is not low. As of workmanager 2.4, devices appear to report as low battery when < 20%.
